text:
@realDonaldTrump We just can't allow these BigBlue Cities & States to pilfer the taxpayers' Treasury by using COVID-19 as cover for years of mismanagement, bad investments, corruption and liberal social programs.

Conservatives are tired of bailing-out the lefty-lib sanctuaries.
